title: Development of Technology-Integrated Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course where university students explore integrating technology into math education to solve real-life problems. Combines theoretical learning with hands-on practice, offering exposure to diverse educational technology tools

learning_goals: One can identify and explain at least three purposes of technology integration in mathematics education
One can design mathematics concept visualization lessons using digital tools (e.g., GeoGebra, Desmos)
One can develop personalized technology-integrated instructional strategies based on learner data analysis

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
